DataElement.preferredName: Past 4 Week Social Behavior Emotion Physical Interference 5 Point Likert Score
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Coded response to a person's reported interference in normal social activities during the past four weeks due to physical health or emotional problems.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Past 4 Week Social Behavior Emotion Physical Interference
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Before the present time._A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.::4_Any period of seven consecutive days._behavior affecting or in response to other individuals, usually of the same species._That aspect of consciousness devoted to affect or feeling; a strong feeling, aroused mental state, or intense state of drive or unrest directed toward a definite object, with physiological, somatic, and behavioral components._Having substance or material existence; concerned with material things; of or pertaining to the body as distinguished from the mind or spirit._The act of hindering or obstructing or impeding.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Before the present time.:A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.::4:Any period of seven consecutive days.:behavior affecting or in response to other individuals, usually of the same species.

Concepts.definition: A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.
Any period of seven consecutive days.
behavior affecting or in response to other individuals, usually of the same species.

Property.preferredDefinition: That aspect of consciousness devoted to affect or feeling; a strong feeling, aroused mental state, or intense state of drive or unrest directed toward a definite object, with physiological, somatic, and behavioral components.:Having substance or material existence; concerned with material things; of or pertaining to the body as distinguished from the mind or spirit.:The act of hindering or obstructing or impeding.

Concepts.definition: That aspect of consciousness devoted to affect or feeling; a strong feeling, aroused mental state, or intense state of drive or unrest directed toward a definite object, with physiological, somatic, and behavioral components.
Having substance or material existence; concerned with material things; of or pertaining to the body as distinguished from the mind or spirit.
The act of hindering or obstructing or impeding.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: information on quality of patient life and ability to function

ValueDomain.preferredName: Quality of Life Pain Assessment 5 Point Likert Score
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The subjective measurement of an individual's sense of well-being and ability to enjoy life.  The concept holds varying meanings for different people and may evolve over time. For some individuals it implies autonomy, empowerment, capability, and choice; for others, security, social integration, or freedom from stress or illness._A disorder characterized by the sensation of marked discomfort, distress or agony._Having determined the value, significance, or extent of._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A subjective answer of no agreement or ability.

Concepts.definition: A subjective answer of no agreement or ability.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The quality of being within reasonable or average limits; not excessive or extreme.

Concepts.definition: The quality of being within reasonable or average limits; not excessive or extreme.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A subjective answer of strong agreement.

Concepts.definition: A subjective answer describing a fairly large amount or extent.

ValueMeaning.changeDescription: Updated definition to match NCIt. mc 9/8/20

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: information on quality of patient life and ability to function

RepresentationTerm.preferredName: Quality of Life Pain Assessment Score
RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: The subjective measurement of an individual's sense of well-being and ability to enjoy life.  The concept holds varying meanings for different people and may evolve over time. For some individuals it implies autonomy, empowerment, capability, and choice; for others, security, social integration, or freedom from stress or illness.:A disorder characterized by the sensation of marked discomfort, distress or agony.:Having determined the value, significance, or extent of.:A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

Concepts.definition: The subjective measurement of an individual's sense of well-being and ability to enjoy life. The concept holds varying meanings for different people and may evolve over time. For some individuals it implies autonomy, empowerment, capability, and choice; for others, security, social integration, or freedom from stress or illness.
A disorder characterized by the sensation of marked discomfort, distress or agony.
The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.
A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ReferenceDocuments.name: During the past 4 weeks, to w
ReferenceDocuments.description: During the past 4 weeks, to what extent has your physical health or emotional problems interfered with your normal social activities with family, friends, neighbors or groups?

DataElement.changeDescription: Curated to support Duke University clinical trial
